name: Power Archer
description:
In this game the player has to shoot an arrow from a moving bow, each arrow can have a color (Red, Blue and Green), after shooting the arrow gets stuck in the wall in front, to earn points the player has to clear the arrows with two special arrows from the respective color.

The arrows that get cleared are only the ones that are in the area between both special arrows and have the same color, the player gets points for each arrow cleared and if the player clears more than 3 arrows at the same time there will be a multiplier that will increase the amount of points the player receives per arrow.

The player loses if an arrow hits another arrow.
